text: The University of Vienna (German: UniversitÃ¤t Wien) is a public university in Vienna, Austria. It was founded by Duke Rudolph IV in 1365 and is the oldest university in the German-speaking world. It is the largest university in Austria and one of the largest in Europe. title: University of Vienna
